title: Human Big Boy
description: Katie and the Union discuss what they should do when they finally meet. Friendly banter includes dogs (12:41), getting your nails done (18:04) and baby sitting (23:44). What words can’t you say when playing tennis (44:08)? Dennis Schroder bet on himself…it didn’t go well (50:30). Leave the McGriddle alone (54:02). JR Smith is going back to school (59:36). Finally, what is something you could do without in your life (1:23:52)?
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and the Union chat about McGriddle's, baby sitting & more
